entry.title: Episode 7 - Navigating Global Energy Shifts | Energy Futures Lab | Imperial College London

link.title: Episode 7 - Navigating Global Energy Shifts | Energy Futures Lab | Imperial College London

entry.content: In this section  In this episode of the Energy Futures Podcast, Lukas Schirren sits down with Dr. Yousef Alshammari, an award-winning energy analyst and founder of CMarkits, to explore the global changes influencing energy markets. From the impact of COVID-19 and geopolitical events to the evolving roles of fossil fuels and renewables, Dr. Alshammari provides insights into navigating today’s energy challenges and working toward a sustainable future.Tune in to learn about the key forces shaping the energy landscape, the role of natural gas as a transition fuel, and how AI and digitalization are paving the way for energy systems of tomorrow. with timestampsDr. Yousef Alshammari is the founder and CEO of CMarkits, with a background in energy analysis and consulting for OPEC and UNECE. His work focuses on sustainable energy solutions, and he’s known for his forward-thinking approach to decarbonisation. Connect with Dr. Alshammari on LinkedInTo deepen your understanding of the topics discussed in this episode, explore the following resources: Stay informed about the latest advancements in clean energy by subscribing to the Energy Futures Podcast on your preferred platform: Follow us for the latest updates on energy research, innovation, and policy: Discover more episodes of the Energy Futures Podcast, where we bring together leading voices in energy to discuss the science, technology, and policies driving the clean energy revolution.  Imperial College London South Kensington Campus London SW7 2AZ, UK tel: +44 (0)20 7589 5111 © 2025 Imperial College London

entry.title: a post with table of contents

link.title: a post with table of contents

entry.content:
This post shows how to add a table of contents in the beginning of the post.

Adding a Table of Contents

To add a table of contents to a post, simply add

toc:
  beginning: true

to the front matter of the post. The table of contents will be automatically generated from the headings in the post.

Example of Sub-Heading 1

Jean shorts raw denim Vice normcore, art party High Life PBR skateboard stumptown vinyl kitsch. Four loko meh 8-bit, tousled banh mi tilde forage Schlitz dreamcatcher twee 3 wolf moon. Chambray asymmetrical paleo salvia, sartorial umami four loko master cleanse drinking vinegar brunch. Pinterest DIY authentic Schlitz, hoodie Intelligentsia butcher trust fund brunch shabby chic Kickstarter forage flexitarian. Direct trade cold-pressed meggings stumptown plaid, pop-up taxidermy. Hoodie XOXO fingerstache scenester Echo Park. Plaid ugh Wes Anderson, freegan pug selvage fanny pack leggings pickled food truck DIY irony Banksy.

Example of another Sub-Heading 1

Jean shorts raw denim Vice normcore, art party High Life PBR skateboard stumptown vinyl kitsch. Four loko meh 8-bit, tousled banh mi tilde forage Schlitz dreamcatcher twee 3 wolf moon. Chambray asymmetrical paleo salvia, sartorial umami four loko master cleanse drinking vinegar brunch. Pinterest DIY authentic Schlitz, hoodie Intelligentsia butcher trust fund brunch shabby chic Kickstarter forage flexitarian. Direct trade cold-pressed meggings stumptown plaid, pop-up taxidermy. Hoodie XOXO fingerstache scenester Echo Park. Plaid ugh Wes Anderson, freegan pug selvage fanny pack leggings pickled food truck DIY irony Banksy.

Table of Contents Options

If you want to learn more about how to customize the table of contents, you can check the jekyll-toc repository.

Example of Sub-Heading 2

Jean shorts raw denim Vice normcore, art party High Life PBR skateboard stumptown vinyl kitsch. Four loko meh 8-bit, tousled banh mi tilde forage Schlitz dreamcatcher twee 3 wolf moon. Chambray asymmetrical paleo salvia, sartorial umami four loko master cleanse drinking vinegar brunch. Pinterest DIY authentic Schlitz, hoodie Intelligentsia butcher trust fund brunch shabby chic Kickstarter forage flexitarian. Direct trade cold-pressed meggings stumptown plaid, pop-up taxidermy. Hoodie XOXO fingerstache scenester Echo Park. Plaid ugh Wes Anderson, freegan pug selvage fanny pack leggings pickled food truck DIY irony Banksy.

Example of another Sub-Heading 2

Jean shorts raw denim Vice normcore, art party High Life PBR skateboard stumptown vinyl kitsch. Four loko meh 8-bit, tousled banh mi tilde forage Schlitz dreamcatcher twee 3 wolf moon. Chambray asymmetrical paleo salvia, sartorial umami four loko master cleanse drinking vinegar brunch.
